abstract_summ: In March of 2020, the World Health Organization declared the SARS-Cov2 2019 (COVID-19) outbreak a global pandemic after documenting community scale transmission in every region, including Latin America . The risk factors associated with severity of disease include older age, diabetes, hypertension, cardiovascular and lung diseases, and immune suppression . Obese patients also have worse outcomes, including respiratory failure, need for mechanical ventilation, and higher mortality .
